thread.title: Miguel Gonzalez
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Miguel Gonzalez

author: Miguel Gonzalez
title: Miguel Gonzalez
text: Going to Costa Rica has been a goal of mine for years now, and have for one reason or other not been able to plan it out due to the daily grind of life.. I was fortunate enough to stumble across vacationscostarica . Com and was even more in luck to have Cindy Peck assist me. This wonderful lady took care of EVERYTHING! I gave her my budget she came in with a vacation I couldn't even have dreamed of and it was UNDER MY BUDGET, not to mention having changed dates about three times because of my busy work schedule, but never once was it a bother to her and it was done within minutes Everytime! If you are planning a vacation do yourself a favor and contact the best costumer service I have seen to date, and the easiest planning to your dream vacation! Cindy Peck thank you!
